downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics CRM Online Migration to Microsoft Dynamics CRM on-premises
downloadDescription: This document lists the steps needed to migrate from a Microsoft CRM Online instance to a Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2015 on-premises deployment.
detailsSection:
The purpose of this document is to summarize the steps needed to migrate from a Microsoft CRM Online instance to a Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2015 on-premises deployment. This document can also be viewed on TechNet Migrate Microsoft Dynamics CRM Online to Microsoft Dynamics CRM On-Premises.
The steps include information on the following:
  1. Restore a copy of the Microsoft Dynamics CRM Online SQL database
  2. Apply required hotfixes
  3. Import the restored Microsoft Dynamics CRM organization into the Microsoft Dynamics CRM on premises deployment
systemRequirementsSection:
Windows Server 2008
Windows Server 2008 R2
Windows Server 2012
Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2015
installInstructionSection: Click Download, and then open or save the document.
